title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: After modifying the default value of the report parameter's list box, the default value is lost.
EB: The default value should be retained and not lost after modifying the default value of the report parameter's list box.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 
2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK. 
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog and modify 'aa' to 'aaa'. Click OK directly. 
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog and verify the default value is still set to 'aaa'.
